content: Well then, I'll take my leave!

So there's something you can't talk about?
I'm pretty curious too, but our ancestral teachings say
we should respect everyone's secrets!

The best arrangements need both sides to agree,
If one side isn't willing, it all falls apart,
Just follow your heart to make the right choice~.

But I've heard it so many times already,
Shouldn't we add something fresh?
Like putting pineapple on pizza!

Oh, that's the reason you mentioned before.
I'm still thinking about it,
Let me gather my thoughts first.
Oh, alright then. See ya.

Lauffie thinks life is more enjoyable now,
and maybe <color=#8AAB4B>someday</color> they'll consider performing at your place!

Interesting!
Let's chat again next time. See you!

Oh...
I haven't thought about moving.
The reason.

Theoretically, it's not impossible.
But what's the reason?

Maybe one day, when my ears think of you
and feel warm and tingly,
that's when I'll know I'm ready!
Invite me to move there? But why?

You seem friendly and all,
but I'd still like a reason for moving~.

I don't understand life,
And I don't think
I need to live with others anymore.

I've already "sorted things out" with my school,
Now I just need to pack my bags and get going!

<color=#8AAB4B>Maybe later</color>,
<color=#8AAB4B>someday</color> it might touch my heart.
Bhan!

Theoretically, it's not impossible,
But theoretically, I'd need approval from my school first,
Let me <color=#8AAB4B>think</color> about it...

"And after the Curiosity Shop disappeared, I thought
I didn't need a fixed residence, but your invitation...
<color=#695c3a>It's somewhat appealing.</color>{短暂停}Oh, it's nothing.
No worries, see you later.

...
Goodbye.

Just as flowers turn toward the sun to bloom,
we must keep moving forward.
Starting a new chapter in life requires not just courage,
but also the right moment.

Wow, sounds like there are lots of exciting things happening over there!
My ears are tingling with excitement!!
If I don't hold them down, they might fly right over to where you are!

Well then, I've made up my mind!
I'll start preparing for the move right away,
and come live with you all as soon as possible!

Don't you have any fresh ideas?
I've already heard about this one!
If you don't create some surprises soon, things will get awkward!

It would be irresponsible to agree without thinking it through.
Could you give me some time to <color=#8AAB4B>think</color> about it?

Your Astralink sounds truly <color=#8AAB4B>enchanting</color>.
But for now,
I must wander this world, seeking the philosophy of my journey.

Moving in together?
That's quite sudden.
Why do you want to invite me?

Is it because we've met so many times,
That our paths had a chance to cross?
Oh fate, won't you tell me why our paths intertwined?

Hm? What's that?
Sneaking around like that... you're making me curious.

Oh?
Take your time, think it through.

While chatting with you has been delightful,
I'm not quite ready to settle down completely yet, but,
I will <color=#8AAB4B>consider</color> all those wonderful things you mentioned.

Though I truly <color=#8AAB4B>long</color> for the Astralink you speak of!
But as my master taught me, I must first complete my martial training
before I can set out...
Looking forward to seeing you again~

You seem pretty confident about convincing me?
Go ahead, let's hear it!

My training schedule is already packed,
but since it's you... go ahead, I'm all ears!

Waking up in the same place every day...
Life might feel a bit less exciting that way.
I wonder, do you have anything surprising where you're from?

You've already told me that reason,
Don't you remember?
Wake up, blink your eyes!
See you later, Bhan Bhan!
Bye-bye, cutie~
Mm-hmm, see you later.

Alright, alright, alright,
I have to admit, that's a pretty convincing argument.

I'm not quite ready today,
Could we save this invitation for <color=#8AAB4B>another time</color>?

Until we meet again in these fated gardens,
dear visitor.

Alright, I'm in!
Let me sneak back and pack my bags first.
Pack your things, I'll be in touch.

Oh, but I accept your invitation.
For now, I'll try out
a new life with you.

You've already introduced this feature.
Could you tell me about something else?
See you around, new friend!

Oh? This is unexpected.
Though I'm not sure why you're inviting me.

My heart's racing, as if I just saw a ruby,
And some special fluorite...
Your reason is quite unique indeed.

So, you're making fun of me?
That's certainly the right way to play with a clown.

About your invitation to move...
Unfortunately...
Oh, we'll talk about it later.

That reason is as alluring as a spinel, making me a bit <color=#8AAB4B>eager</color>,
Though not quite as captivating as a ruby,
Maybe next time, definitely next time!
What fun and interesting things do you have over there?

Your introduction and the life I <color=#8AAB4B>dream of</color>,
they're so similar... if only work wasn't in the way...
Next time, definitely next time.

I wonder what fate awaits us at our next meeting?
If our reunions are numbered,
I'll cherish every single encounter.
Could you tell me about your hometown?
See you next time we get lost, Bhan!

Well then, what do you think,
Should I pick a fixed spot to wake up in?
Could it be that you have something there that might interest me?

But you know, it'll take a while to sort through
all the costumes, masks, and other props
we have in storage...

You must have invited me for an important reason... right?
In that case, Manna will listen carefully.

Thank you for the invitation that gave me a reason to start anew.
So, as my first step forward,
I'll head home for now~.

I'll consider your invitation.
Oh, and I still have some commissions to handle,
So I haven't thought about moving anywhere for now.
Farewell, fellow wanderer!
Farewell, fellow wanderer!
You think I should... {短暂停}live with you?

Well... maybe...
Theoretically... practically... if we plan it out...
It should work just fine!

That sounds really interesting,
but my training schedule is already packed to the brim.
<color=#8AAB4B>Later</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>later</color> for sure!
